title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Virtual World-Based Elementary Social Studies Practical Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of elementary social studies and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Three or more creative strategies can be designed to solve real-world social studies problems in virtual environments for elementary education

Learners will collaborate with three peer teachers on Gather.town or Miro to create a social studies project plan (including theme, objectives, activity stages, evaluation methods) within two weeks, incorporate at least three of five peer feedbacks, and submit a final version meeting rubric standards (clarity, feasibility, creativity)
Data collected in virtual worlds via mobile devices can be analyzed to derive actionable insights for educational contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
